title: The Missing Yesterdays
description: "um . . . oops!"So begins the first adventure for premier scientist Tremain, and his nephew Christopher.On New Earth, Tremain shows Christopher his newest invention. They . . . accidentally . . . erase the entire colony's past. Can they restore their Missing Yesterdays before they fade away?Here are what some reviewers are saying:"I read it in one sitting!""Doctor Who meets Sherlock meets Inspector Gadget . . .""A real page-turner . . . ""The Hunger Games meets Star Trek in this bold new age novel . . . "
author: Terry Marchion
